Job.company: R2R Consultants hiring for Leading health Care Indusrtry
Job.education: UG: Any Graduate, MBBS - Medicine PG:Medical-MS/MD - Any Specialization, Pharmacology
Job.jobDescription: Job Description Send me Jobs like this Greeting from R2R Consultants!!! We have excellent opportunity with an leading Health care Industry.. MD Pharmacology Freshers only Apply Job Location- Kolkota/Bangalore Job Designation- Scientific project manager Job Description. Participate in set up, oversight and follow-up of assigned clinical studies/medical projects, ensuring that the studies are carried out in accordance with all relevant processes and procedures Assist relationships and advance the scientific credibility of the Company with established and emerging Regional/National Opinion Leaders (OL). Respond to requests for scientific/medical information and provide key scientific information updates to Regional and National OLs, as appropriate. Develop/maintain key scientific knowledge that enable credible dissemination of scientific information, informed scientific dialogue with physicians/OLs and development of professional working relationships Ensure compliance with all applicable national laws & regulations, guidelines, codes of conduct, Abbotts policies & procedures, and accepted standards of best practice PRIMARY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES - EXAMPLES KEY CUSTOMERS Provide scientific and technical support for, and help maintain professional and credible relationships with, key OLs/ academic centres to ensure access to current medical/scientific information on the products/areas of therapeutic interest. Assist in initiation, oversight and follow up of assigned clinical studies/medical projects initiated within the relevant TA (e.g. post marketing clinical activities such as registry/database projects, epidemiological surveys, post-authorization studies (phase IV), IIS projects, etc.). Note: all activities to comply with applicable local laws, guidelines, codes of practice, SOPs, and GPRD SOPs. Maintain contacts with physicians and OLs of the assigned geographic area in order to satisfy their needs for scientific knowledge in the therapeutic area and, where requested, Abbott drugs/products the SPM carries responsibility for. Deliver credible presentations on scientific matters to physicians, individually or in groups (meetings, clinical sessions, etc.), where requested. Internal Clinical Research Manager Clinical Operations Manager Medical Advisers/Managers Marketing department of the therapeutic area Sales organization of the geographic area of responsibility. Administrative personnel of the Medical Department and of the Business Unit. Pharmacovigilance Unit of the Affiliate. Medical Information Service. IMD/GPT/GSS/MBO Personnel Participate in the selection process to identify appropriately qualified physicians the Company would wish to engage in collaborative efforts such as potential research collaborations, or lecture/meeting support (Round Tables, Congresses, Symposia, etc.); and to ensure a high level of scientific or educational integrity in these collaborative efforts. Develop awareness and understanding of competitor issues/intelligence for example, product strategies, studies, commercial messages, positioning, etc and communicate, where appropriate, within the Company. External Healthcare personnel of the medical area in which the SPM performs his or her functions (physicians, nurses, pharmacists) Participating Research Investigators Opinion leaders Institutions and Scientific or Medical Societies Attend relevant Scientific Societies meetings/Conferences, and develop summaries of key messages for use within the Company such as key areas of scientific/company interest, new trends in diagnosis, monitoring & treatments in the TA, etc. AUTHORITY / REPORTING LINES LOCATION Upon request, assist physicians appropriately direct requests for access to Company products on a named patient or compassionate use basis, subject to all applicable legal and regulatory requirements Support sales/marketing/internal team areas to develop their scientific and technical expertise through the delivery of scientific update presentations. Provide KOLs & internal medical/clinical teams with scientific/technical support for publications of scientific/ medical interest. Ensure up to date knowledge of products uses and external data. Perform administrative duties in a timely manner as assigned. Reports to a Medical Manager (or equivalent) of an assigned Therapeutic Area Typically this function is field (remote to office) based REQUIRED CORE COMPETENCIES / ATTRIBUTES - EXAMPLES REQUIRED MEDICAL KNOWLEDGE AREAS Adaptability Maintains effectiveness when experiencing major changes in work tasks or the work environment; adjusts effectively to work within new work structures, processes, requirements, or cultures. Considers change or new situations as opportunities for learning and growth. Perseveres when encountering adversity. When confronted with a problem or crisis, considers alternatives and then takes timely action. Effectively prioritizes work tasks. Initiative Takes prompt action to accomplish objectives; is proactive. Maintains a strong focus on internal and/or external customers. Continuously monitors relevant information, key issues and/or trends. Proactively seeks feedback and adapts behavior to improve performance. Demonstrates a willingness to learn new aspects of the business. Solid knowledge of pharmaceutical industry Knowledge of the scientific methods applied to clinical research and the current legislative/regulatory controls. Keen interest in developing and maintaining expert knowledge for assigned therapeutic area/product and in medical research in general REQUIRED PERSONAL / TECHNICAL SKILLS Innovation Generates innovative solutions in work situations; tries different and novel ways to deal with work problems and opportunities. Uses best practice and benchmark data to increase organizational performance. Identifies opportunities to improve efficiencies and red uce costs. Integrity Firmly adheres to codes of conduct and ethical principles. Exhibits honesty. Presents information accurately and completely. Keeps commitments to work colleagues and customers. Acknowledges and responds constructively to failure and mistakes. Team work / collaboration Works effectively and cooperatively with others; establishes and maintains good working relationships with internal and external partners to facilitate the accomplishment of work goals. Helps others achieve shared goals. Demonstrates a willingness to listen without interrupting. Open to diverse and different ideas. High customer orientation Excellent skills to set stake-holders relationship, networking, tact and diplomacy Strong commitment to compliance with the relevant rules and procedures, and to scientific quality and integrity A good understanding of written English * Where these fall within area of responsibility Candidates from Pan India can apply Kindly revert me back with your update resume Email Id: recruiter3@r2rconsults.com Qualification - MD Pharmacology(Fresher) Regards, Nitya Nair R2R Consults Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Pharma / Biotech / Clinical Research Functional Area: Medical , Healthcare , R&D , Pharmaceuticals , Biotechnology Role Category:R&D Role:Clinical Research Associate/Scientist Keyskills MD Pharmacology Medical advisor Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Any Graduate, MBBS - Medicine PG:Medical-MS/MD - Any Specialization, Pharmacology Company Profile: R2R Consultants Leading health Care Indusrtry R2R is driven by active partnerships with industry bodies and customers with unparalleled domain knowledge. R2R's Customised Approach in deploying these solutions supports clients with best fit solutions to match up to their requirements. Clients can expect to Stay Ahead in their businesses by partnering with R2R. We not only understand the domain and "talk the language" but also can help our customers to get aligned with industry initiatives! Download PPT Photo 1 View Contact Details

Provide consulting services for IT risk and security expertise to assist business units to meet their business requirements Assist IT Operations and Application Development with the implementation of information security best practices Deeply understand and implement security protocols and standards according to best practices. Assess potential items of risk and opportunities for vulnerabilities in the application and infrastructure In-depth knowledge and understanding of systems infrastructure, maintaining system integrity in accordance with the security policy of the organization. Configures software and other components to align them with specific organizational needs. Participate in information security audits (i.e., Customer Audits: finance source, Company Member, internal, SOC I, SOC II & GLBA) to proactively minimize and eliminate information security vulnerabilities. Act as liaison between Security and IT teams to enable efficiency and coordination in communication and responses to Customer Audits. Respond to information security incidents and assist with internal and coordination in communication and responses to investigations. Maintain safety, security, and privacy standards throughout all areas of responsibility. Job.jobDescription: Job Description Send me Jobs like this Experience - 3+ Years Designation - Talent Acquisition Sourcer Job Location - Bangalore Notice Period - 15 Days We are looking for an experienced Sourcer/Recruiter to join our Global Strategic Sourcing team. The Global Strategic Sourcing team works in partnership with the Recruiting teams to provide proactive and predictive recruiting services for HPE with a focus on developing pipelines of qualified talent and sourcing candidates with niche skill sets. Your role will be to proactively target and headhunt passive talent, for profiles which are not easily filled with traditional recruiting methods, and build talent pools of qualified candidates ready to be hired. Key responsibilities of the Sourcer include: * Providing specialized sourcing expertise for technical and niche profiles. This includes designing creative and innovative ways of finding passive external talent for HPE * Building and maintaining talent pools of suitably qualified candidates based on business demands * Consulting with hiring managers and recruiters to develop a strategic sourcing plan and ensure successful recruitment of quality candidates * Direct and proactive outreach to passive talent, including cold calling and headhunting * Fully qualifying the candidate during an initial telephone interview * Proactively using e-recruitment tools and Social Media to source top qualified candidates and keep up-to-date with new trends in sourcing * Staying present in the process and engaged with the candidate thought out the full recruitment lifecycle * Developing and maintaining effective networks to maximize visibility and attract top quality candidates. * Contributing to HPE's diversity objectives by developing a diverse top qualified pool of candidates (as applicable by geography) Support will be provided by the current team in order to build your knowledge of the organisation, systems and recruitment channels. Qualifications: E xperience * Substantial experience in a recruitment agency environment where you have been involved in directly sourcing, headhunting, cold calling and interviewing candidates * Demonstrated experience of managing hiring manager and stakeholder expectations * Experience of recruiting experienced IT professionals * First-level university degree or equivalent preferred * Experience of using social networking tools for recruitment e.g. LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter * Proven track record of delivering sufficient, high-quality pipelines for multiple complex searches simultaneously Skills & Competencies * Strong knowledge of recruitment and external market trends across India * Motivated team player with a passion for recruitment * Proficient at time management and organization with a strong sense of urgency, flexibility, and adaptability * Ability to effectively sell the HPE value proposition to candidates * Superior communication (written/verbal), presentation, and facilitation skills, with the ability to communicate effectively across all employee groups and levels (executives, managers & employees) * Persuasive and effective email and phone communication skills * Able to deal with ambiguity and changing landscapes * Creative mindset, able to think outside the box * Autonomous strategic thinker and change driver - makes things happen * Expert analytical & problem-solving skills * Ability to work in a collaborative manner and develop strong working relationships with clients, employees and HR colleagues. Tech Mahindra is part of the US $15.4 billion Mahindra Group and is a leading global systems integrator and business transformation consulting organization, focused primarily on the telecommunications industry. Tech Mahindra helps companies innovate and transform by leveraging its unique insights, differentiated services and flexible partnering models. This has helped customers reduce operating costs, generate new revenue streams and gain competitive advantage. Tech Mahindra expanded its IT portfolio in 2009 by acquiring the leading global business and information technology services company, Mahindra Satyam (earlier known as Satyam Computer Services). Tech Mahindra's capabilities spread across a broad spectrum, including Business Support Systems (BSS), Operations Support Systems (OSS), Network Design & Engineering, Next Generation Networks, Mobility Solutions, Security consulting and Testing. Tech Mahindra's solutions portfolio includes Consulting, Application Development & Management, Network Services, Solution Integration, Product Engineering, Infrastructure Managed Services, Remote Infrastructure Management and BSG (comprises BPO, Services and Consulting). With an array of service offerings for TSPs, TEMs and ISVs, Tech Mahindra is a chosen transformation partner for several leading wireline, wireless and broadband operators in Europe, Asia-Pacific and North America. Tech Mahindra has successfully implemented more than 16 Greenfield Operations globally and has over 130 active customer engagements mostly in the Telecom sector. The company has been involved in about 8 transformation programs of incumbent telecom operators. Tech Mahindra has a global footprint through operations in more than 31 countries with 17 sales offices and 15 delivery centers. Assessed at SEI CMMi Level 5, Tech Mahindra's track record for value delivery is supported by over 40,500 professionals who provide a unique blend of culture, domain expertise and in depth technology skill sets. Its development centers are ISO 9001:2008 & BS7799 certified. Download PPT Photo 1 View Contact Details

Job.jobDescription: Job Description Send me Jobs like this They are looking out for a lot of TEAM LEADER (VOICE PROCESS) with 4 to 9 years of EXPERIENCE out of which 1 year should be into team Leading. Dimension & Scope: This position is responsible for supporting; coaching; developing and supervising a group of employees in a Service Center/Operations environment. Principal Duties and Responsibilities: Monitor, identify and resolve performance/behavior/attendance issues using prescribed performance management techniques. Monitor and take action on TKS, personnel and payroll issues. Conduct performance appraisals annually. Review Companiess compliance documents as required. Responsible for staffing and hiring. Maintain current employee records on direct reports. Review CMS statistics on a daily basis and provide constructive feedback. Provide Subject Matter Expertise. Ensure training needs of subordinates are met. Modify Operations as needed to meet service level agreements under supervision of Operations Manager. Successfully complete all client related training. Resolve escalated customer issues. Hold team meetings on a regular basis with direct reports. Communicate all process and client changes to direct reports within specific timeliness Promote the use of all center communication tools. Responsible for day-to-day functional supervision of non-exempt work group, including work assignment and attendance monitoring; providing input into selecting, training, developing, and completing performance appraisal of work group(s) in accordance with the organizations policies and applicable legal requirements. Education & Professional Certifications: Associates degree in related field or advanced vocational training with two to four years related experience; or Bachelors degree or equivalent with three or more years of related work experience. Candidate Profile: Candidate should be an existing team leader for at least 1 year. Should have exhaustive experience in driving customer satisfaction related deliverables Experience in telecom industry preferable. Current team size should be minimum 15 associates. Ability to guide individuals toward goal achievement using negotiation, teamwork / collaboration, motivation and staff development skills including the ability to act as a role model within the organization. Ability to demonstrate innovation and good judgment / problem solving skills when making decisions. Ability to establish a course of action for self and others to accomplish a specific goal while using appropriate resources. Job.jobtitle: Job Opening for Undergraduate Freshers in BPO Voice Process
Job.company: Ikya Human Capital Solutions Pvt Ltd
Job.jobDescription: Job Description Send me Jobs like this Are you an undergraduate looking for job and couldnt get anywhere and looking for ways to start your career, why dont you try in BPO? Shift and off: UK shift/Night shift; 2 way cabs available Job location: Ecospace, belandur/Bommanahalli/Brookfield Type : International voice process/Domestic voice process Salary: 2.5 LPA-4 LPA Why to start career in BPO? BPO has always been a career choice which gives you an opportunity to grow and develop your personality and communication skills. The recent survey also tells the fast growth of this industry Your skills to become globally competitive. BPO is the most stable and fast growing industry nowadays despite the global economic crisis. Great career opportunities await qualified individuals who will join the industry. Working in a call center will also help you develop your communication skills Your grade of pay in voice processing industry: Your salary would depend on the company at which you are working. Salaries also depend of the nature of call centers and shifts. As a fresher you can start from 10000/- or more and when you become managers then you draw more than 30,000/- per month. After this you also get perks and other benefits as well. Requisites Education is not a matter of concern if you have excellent fluency in English Flexible to work in shifts Willing to work in voice process Job roles and responsibilities: Voice Process: As it suggests, you need to talk to customers and get things done. Voice jobs pay more compared to non voice. The main activity in a call center is to handle the customers queries effectively and satisfactory. Also to co-ordinate well in a team in order to offer the best service possible to the customer. Career opportunity in Voice processing can be best describes as the ways in which customers can get their complaints and grievances answered and fixed with the help of the voice processors. It is a technical term that needs some kind of an interaction between the callers and the called. They have been given many terms as well. You can also be known as a customer support and many such names just to mention a few. There are other job profiles as well in the same stream. It depends on the agency for which you are working and the type of job which you have grabbed. Career prospects of a voice processor: It has been see that the ones who would want to go for a career in this line never fail. You have ample options and companies to join. There are different sections of a call center where you can work and earn money. You can also start your own call center when you are well experienced. Never forget to have a taste of each and every section in a voice processing industry so that you can get into any section whenever you would want. There are no scarcities of job in this sector. Job.jobDescription: Job Description Send me Jobs like this We have openings with ScaleneWorks for SOW Coordinator at Bangalore. Duties and Responsibilities: Scope: PRIMARY - Accountable to manage the end to end SOW process between Vendor and Client as being efficiently executed with the purpose of driving timely and accurate tracking which feeds Vendor payable - critical data collection SECONDARY - Provide administrative and client facing support as needed to address outstanding finance / billable issues that stem from SOW timing activities Activities: - Work closely with recruiters and onboarding teams to confirm contractors hired and eligible for specific onboarding and SOW submission - adhere to Client submission requirements and submit SOW request through Client system - track all submissions to ensure they are returned - manage resubmissions with Client directly for inaccuracies - Work with Vendors to ensure alignment of start dates on SOW to align with billing - Work with Vendor billing departments to ensure billing issue and SOW issues are effectively resolved - Work directly with Client SOW team to help in expediting SOW issues - Tracking down any necessary approvals for bill rates on SOW as necessary prior to submission - Manage all end date extensions and end dates - working closely with Account Admin on active headcount status - provide additional onboarding and contractor management support as needed - ensure deadline and timeframes are met - provide administrative support to A/R teams to help manage outstanding receivables with Client finance teams sitting offshore - Co-ordinate with onboarding and finance teams to manage new hires. Measures: - All new SOW submittals are sent in within 24 hours of start date. Skill Sets: - Comfortable working in excel with basic knowledge to move data around, fill in templates, create a basic table and fill in data. - Good customer service skills / ability to write emails to external clients to support the submission and retrieval of necessary paperwork. - Good phone skills needs to be able to handle themselves on the phone with clients, vendors and internal Vendor teams - basic knowledge of finance and accounting practices would be advantageous - familiar with operating practices - High attention to detail and accuracy - Ability to work independently. Timings: US Time Zone. Job.jobtitle: R&D Engineer - Core Java Devlopers | Ipsoft - Bangalore
Job.education: UG: B.Tech/B.E. - Any Specialization PG:Post Graduation Not Required
Job.jobDescription: Job Description Send me Jobs like this Job Title : R&D Engineer Department : Research and Development Education : Bachelors degree in Computer Science or equivalent Location : Bangalore (ITPL, Whitefield) Overview: In the R&D world, speed and quality are sometimes two competing factors. On the one hand, there is the sprint to delivery and on the other hand, there is the standard of excellence. Our Developers balance the need for speed and functionality with their commitment to quality. We seek R&D engineers who can shape the future of infrastructure management. Responsibilities: We are looking for hands-on developers ready to work with scientists tackling the big challenges in deep language understanding. With an extensive existing customer base and a market-leading position in help desk automation, your work will go into production as soon as it shows measurable improvement over current methods. We think long term, while putting our research into practice on a rational schedule. You are passionate about good code and know how to make it a reality - how to fight for quality and sprint to delivery, managing the need for speed and functionality and the commitment to quality. You know how to use the latest tools and frameworks, not just because they're new, but because they help get the job done. You know how to lead and mention junior engineers and follow and deliver results for managers on predictable schedules. Work with other members of R&D, Systems, Applications, and Networking to design and build infrastructure management systems. Write clean, scalable, documented code and unit tests. To work on SQL/MYsql is a must. Continuously research new technologies, frameworks, and libraries. "Own" applications, features, and any associated bugs or performance problems. Tune and enhance 3rd party systems to meet requirements in any language. Help build a professional software development infrastructure. Bug tracking, version control, branching strategies, continuous integration, etc. Analyze and distill requirements into actionable development tasks. You should be comfortable defining delivery schedules and metrics for performance assessment and meeting your targets. Qualifications: First and foremost we need great code and great coders. A great coder should be able to learn a new framework quickly, so experience with each of the items below just helps us understand your experience, but each is desirable Java Spring, Guava, JDBC, Tomcat, JUnit Development tools such as Maven, Jenkins, Ant, Eclipse Expertise in building highly scalable, fault tolerant, distributed systems. Exceptional Java development skills and familiarity with open source libraries and their integration is required. Experience integrating multiple open source libraries and frameworks into working systems. Linux experience as a primary development operating system. Debugging and performance tuning of complex, multi-tier applications. Database design experience: JMS, JSP, Servlets, JDBC Spring Framework ORM libraries (Hibernate or Toplink) Application server experience SQL and data model design XML schema design, XSLT, Xpath Internet related protocols: TCP/IP, SSL, HTTP, etc. Jakarta commons Eclipse or other modern IDE. Version control systems. Perl Over 5 years core Java (server-side) development experience, experience with 1.5 features. The candidates must be a self-starter Excellent interpersonal and communication skills. Personal specifications: Possesses good analytical & troubleshooting skills Flexible attitude and can do attitude Drives improvements and process innovation Familiar with Cognitive technologies Salary:INR 9,00,000 - 19,00,000 P.A Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: IT Software - System Programming Role Category:Programming & Design Role:Software Developer Keyskills java core java JSP Servlets JDBC JMS Sprint MVC Shell scripting MySQL ActiveMQ php Spring Web Services Http Logical question Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: B.Tech/B.E. - Any Specialization PG:Post Graduation Not Required Company Profile: IPsoft Global Services Private Limited ABOUT IPSOFT IPsoft is a global, industry-leading managed services company offering a complete solution to enterprise customers for outsourcing global IT operations. We offer a full range of managed services to our clients, from management at the individual component, device and network level to the analysis, design and management of complex business processes. IPsoft's unique (and proprietary) automation technology remediates more than half of the detected exceptions in our managed client environments. We manage our customers' systems through our worldwide Network Operations Centers located in New York City (HQ), London, Amsterdam and Bangalore. IPsoft has been solidly profitable since its inception as a company in 1998, and has roughly doubled its gross revenues for four straight years; we are on a trajectory to continue this rapid growth pace, meaning that you will have an opportunity to grow with the company. CULTURE IPsoft is committed to helping our employees develop their full potential in both business and technical spheres, and it is our policy to recognize excellent performance by promoting from within. IPsoft is a fast-paced, energetic and fun place to work. We2019re changing the way managed services are delivered to customers, and we2019re looking for people who want to make a difference. The best evidence that IPsoft is a good place to work? People come to work here and stay. If you come to work at IPsoft, you2019ll be working with cutting-edge technologies and the bright, driven people who develop them. Download PPT Photo 1 View Contact Details

Job Description Send me Jobs like this Role: The Analyst, as part of NHs Business Analytics team, will play a key role in shaping and strengthening NHs competitive edge. The Analyst will mine data from various sources, help design analyses, model the data to deliver meaningful and impactful insights. Job Responsibilities Develop and continuously refine comprehensive models and help construct dashboards and reports for various verticals.Identify and integrate various data sources and data points required to populate the models. Identify data gaps and drive clean-up and sanitation of data gaps.Help design visuals to effectively represent the data models and analyses to provide a clear structure for decision making. Understanding of data analysis and presentation concepts that facilitate collaborative work with BI engineer, Data Architect, Application developers and end users. Develop and deploy ETL job workflow with reliable error/exception handling and rollback Framework using SSIS Design, development and support of ETL components using SSIS and other ETL tools, which will be used to move data from source data and software application data stores into the optimized operational databases and Data Warehouse Design & develop SQL queries and reports to validate target data against source data Provide operational support and maintenance of data integrity between data sources and data warehouse Tuning the ETL processes, creation of the technical and system specification documents necessary to support ETL processes. Participate in development and execution of unit and system test plans Adapt ETL code to accommodate changes in source data and new business requirements. Document the ETL detailed design and test results. Prioritize development and enhancement requests. Manages automation of file processing as well as all ETL processes within a job workflow. Ensures data quality throughout entire ETL process. Ensures compliance with regulatory requirements for data transmission, business rules, storage, and data access including documentation, testing, and remediation. Collaborates with subject matter experts, department Leaders and database architect to define and execute cross-functional data movements for all aspects of data warehouse Create, maintain and optimize stored procedures, database and ETL processes Work with all levels of development from analysis through implementation and support. Interact with report owners to establish/clarify their requirements and develop report specifications. Develop Dashboard using Power BI. Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: KPO / Research / Analytics Functional Area: Analytics & Business Intelligence Role Category:Analytics & BI Role:Data Analyst Keyskills SQL Predictive Modeling Business Analytics Data Analysis Reporting Software Development Computer Science Problem Solving Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Company Profile: Narayana Hrudayalaya Health City Narayana Health, one of India's largest and World's most economical healthcare service providers is set to emerge as a global industry model for its ability to reconcile quality, affordability, scale, transparency, credibility and sustainable profitability. From 300 beds hospital in 2001, Narayana Health has grown to a 6900 beds healthcare conglomerate in 2014 with 26 hospitals present in 16 Cities within the country and also has International Presence in Cayman. NH has been known for its cost- cutting approach and ranked 36th among World's 50 Most Innovative Companies by Fast Companies in 2012. NH has also been a proud recipient of Frost & Sullivan India Healthcare Excellence Awards 2012 in the category Healthcare Service Provider Company of the Year and FICCI Health Care Excellence Award 2012 for Addressing Industry Issues. Job.jobDescription: Job Description Send me Jobs like this We have an urgent requirement for the post of Sr. Code Vulnerability Engineer with one of our client in Bangalore Position:Sr. Code Vulnerability Engineer. Mode : Permanent Exp : 8+yrs Location:Bangalore NP : Max 30Days General Description and Responsibilities Senior Code Vulnerability Engineer will play a critical role in code security and secure software development life cycle. It will encompass a broad range of information security controls to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of enterprise data stored on a variety of vendor database solutions. The job is composed of tactical, operational and strategic functions and responsibilities. Responsibilities Include: Conducted static and dynamic analysis on a variety of code bases and platforms. Conduct Information Security assessments / penetration tests, as an individual, self-managed tester, or in small project teams. Discover security vulnerabilities in web and mobile applications and provide recommended remediation steps to developers. Apply industry best practices for vulnerability and threat management. Document findings for management and technical staff and recommend mitigating actions. Work with internal customers to determine their need for security assessments, present and explain the employed methodology, and support them with feedback and verification during mitigation. Develop training on secure coding techniques and security awareness for technical staff (e.g., software developers). Position Requirements Bachelors Degree in Information Technology, Cyber Security, Computer Security, Computer Science or related field required. 8 years of development experience in mobile or web Ability to maintain composure in a dynamic environment Strong knowledge of Objective C Strong understanding of Java, C#, PHP, .Net, C Experience with, IBM AppScan, HP Fortify, Checkmarx and Veracode Experience with implementing security in the Agile development SDLC Individual must be proactive, self-motivated, detail-oriented, creative, inquisitive and persistent Strong leadership skills, including ability to execute and prioritize a number of tasks simultaneously Ability to organize, plan and implement work assignments, prioritize competing demands and work under pressure of frequent and tight deadlines Ability to approach problems systematically, researching all alternatives and making appropriate recommendations Excellent presentation, verbal and written communication skills Understanding of current attack methods, penetration testing methods, and hacking tools, specifically for web and mobile applications Strong hands-on and can-do attitude, excellent interpersonal and intercultural skills, ability to work in teams of technical and non-technical experts Ability to work methodically and independently and prioritize work Other duties as assigned. Desired Qualifications: Experience in Python a plus Major Certifications (such as GSSP-JAVA, GSSP-.Net, GWEB, GMOB, GWAPT, OSWE) Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Recruitment / Staffing Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Admin/Maintenance/Security/Datawarehousing Role:System Administrator Keyskills Objective C Java .Net PHP C# Python Web Technologies Agile Development Database Mobile Applications Desired Candidate Profile Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: Bob Technologies Bob Technologies Download PPT Photo 1 View Contact Details

Job.jobDescription: Job Description Send me Jobs like this About the department Operational Excellence (OpEx) being a part of GSC Support is a combination of cLEAN & Automation. cLEAN is the amalgamation of 2 most effective methodologies Lean and Six Sigma which is used to drive continuous improvement in GSC to reduce cost, creates efficiency, improves productivity and reduces errors. The ambition of Opex team in GSC is to Drive cLEAN competency development, Ensure Business impact from cLEAN & automation project execution and Implement cLEAN mind set. To drive this ambition cLEAN team identifies opportunities, drives, trains & mentors Lean Six Sigma projects & also provide consulting services to operation teams. The position Key responsibilities: Lead transition projects required to transition work into GSC Bangalore. Drive projects in GSC on budget, scope, and within timeline. Support Director cLEAN Business Support & Operational Excellence in implementing relevant management tools and business improvement ideas. Main job tasks: Lead transition projects required to transition work into GSC Bangalore Responsible for leading, facilitating and coordinating all transition activities from various SVP areas required to transition work into GSC. Prepare the project plan, track project milestones and own end to end responsibility for the projects Conduct various phases of transition: Pre-Transition, Transition Phase & Post-Transition Phase Scheduling & Planning Project requirements. Assist the sending organization in identifying the potential work that can be transitioned to GSC Bangalore Interaction with key stakeholders such as VPs / SVPs / Managers who are part of the steering committee for work transition project Develop the customized transition plan as per the requirement and drive it end to end Responsible for change management throughout the transition Risk management throughout the transition project Status update and interaction with key stakeholders in the respective LoB from time to time Propose changes periodically based on the experience and status of the transition project Responsible for framing the right governance structure related to the transition project Drive projects in GSC Drive projects in Global Service Centre (GSC) Bangalore e.g. strategy setting, GSCMan workshops, establishment of Support GSC functions, process optimisation in GSC Bangalore (Support GSC or functional areas), organisational changes, facility expansion, IT system development and roll-out etc.. Support Director cLEAN Business Support & Operational Excellence in implementing relevant management tools and business improvement ideas Contribute to the development of GSC by assessing potential new functional areas in GSC, project opportunities in GSC Bangalore, performing internal/external benchmarking, support the GSC management meetings through preparing the presentation, driving the agenda, manage the minutes / follow-ups while working with PM-GSC Ongoing support to Director cLEAN Business Support & Operational Excellence with ad hoc analyses e.g. budget reports, business cases, GSC effectiveness, leave and absence analyses, various benchmarks etc. Assist in building relevant presentations, fact packs, external meeting preparations, arranging field visits etc Assist in setting up GSC Projects team Qualifications Education: Master Degree (preferably within business, economics or engineering) with results in top 10% or other relevant business experience e.g. from management consultancy. Experience: Proven project management experience Manage entire project, including structure and plan own work, meet all commitments, deal with issues, and actively drive project decision making Independently ensure senior/expert involvement when necessary Drive project problem solving, including defining and clarifying problems, structuring and prioritising issues, identifying analyses and approach, and developing recommendations Manage and take full ownership of end products, including follow-up and manage time, budget and quality Frequently communicate project progress to PM-GSC, project sponsor/owner, steering committee, and/or other appointed persons Identify and handle all relevant stakeholders within project/own area of work Understand and use proper communication methods and techniques in relation to project Knowledge application Pro-actively work to develop relevant knowledge such as models, frameworks, templates required by the transition and other projects Leverage project support and guidance from other relevant NN areas and external sources in all parts of project Apply core concepts and best practices and reach out to peers and/or superior for additional insights when appropriate Pro-actively solve project team conflicts, resource needs and requests. Personal skills: Strong leadership and interpersonal skills Drive and motivate project team members and other stakeholders Coach project members, pro-actively ensure feedback (both upwards and downwards), and take action to improve own and team performance, including pro-actively identifying relevant courses and training possibilities Push team and stakeholders if necessary, to achieve results, demonstrate drive, initiative, and a can-do mentality towards project tasks Strong English communication skills, both written and oral Proficient in the use of PC tools (Microsoft Office etc.) High degree of flexibility, and can shoulder additional workload when necessary Project related resource planning and reporting Working at Novo Nordisk At Novo Nordisk, we create value by putting patients first. Every ten seconds two people are diagnosed with diabetes, and more than 371 million people worldwide need us. Working here is not just a way to make a living, but a way to make a difference. GSC is one of Novo Nordisk's five global hubs, comprising of a wide range of functional areas across various Novo Nordisk functions. Over a short span of time, GSC has grown exponentially with the establishment of additional functional units, aiming to take advantage of the talent, skills and cost efficiencies India has to offer. All the services are being provided to different departments and affiliates within the Novo Nordisk A/S. GSC was officially established in 2010 and has experienced growth from 180 to 800+ employees in the last few years. Job.jobDescription: Job Description Send me Jobs like this THE ROLE: We are currently seeking an experienced professional at a Manager level within IT Advisory (ITAS) for our KPMG Risk Consulting practice to join us in our Bangalore office. A Manager would typically be responsible for delivering specific IT Internal Audit and IT Risk assessment work, managing teams and managing quality of work. It includes establishing themselves as a subject matter expert in one or more chosen field of expertise, and delivering high quality work. Responsibilities: Responsible as team lead for performing a comprehensive program of compliance monitoring services in IT SOx 404 Audits, IT Internal Audit, business process/application controls testing and PCI DSS (payment certifications) in Financial Services Responsible for delivery and management of all testing of ITGCCs and application/business controls as it relates to SOX controls testing lifecycle. Responsible for seeing that all activities are performed in accordance with the agreed delivery timeline of controls testing and any escalations are properly communicated. Support in annual and quarterly plan for controls testing and communication of dependencies to the client. Coordinate with client for on-going observations, escalations to ensure minimum impact to actual delivery and all to ensure risks to delivery are communicated properly. Perform special assignments of a complex and/or sensitive nature as directed by the Quality lead and/or Operations lead as requested by client when necessary. Perform 100% detailed review of all steps of testing by team members and documentation to ensure minimum quality rejects. Perform a continuous quality improvement exercise to implement lessons learned of previous quarter rejects to make sure no repeats. Lead client walkthrough calls independently, demonstrating understanding of client's IT environment. Manage team of professionals in delivering Technology Risk engagements catering to Financial Services Develop people through effectively supervising, coaching, and mentoring all levels of staff Conduct performance reviews and contribute to performance feedback for all levels of staff Support leadership in maintaining an educational program to continually develop personal skills Understand, follow and communicate workplace policies and procedures to all levels of staff INDIVIDUAL: Successful candidates will display a combination of the following: Strong understanding of IT Sox, IT Internal Audit, data analytics, business process/application controls testing and Financial Services Industry certificate expertise, for example - CHAPS, MPS, LINK, etc. Demonstrating a detailed understanding of how current and emerging legal, regulatory, governance, IT SOx auditing and IT security standards that affect the clients Proven experience of successfully delivering high volume work to financial services industry clients. Ability to identify and assess complex IT risks and controls, Application controls and risks to relate them to the wider business environment and to express opinions clearly. Displays excellent Project and Client management skills to deliver high quality work on time and to budget Articulates the importance of delivering high quality work and risk management to the team Clearly articulates the expectation regarding work results, time effort and timelines to team members Encourages and motivates team members to achieve targets Seeks to understand people's motivations Prior experience in managing long term engagements would be preferred Manages the expectations of people regarding career development and progression Proactively addresses underperformance in both individuals and teams Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Accounting / Finance Functional Area: IT Software - Network Administration , Security Role Category:Admin/Maintenance/Security/Datawarehousing Role:IT/Networking-Manager Keyskills Team Management Auditing Planning SOX Client Management Team Leading IT Risk Risk Assessment Risk Management Quality Improvement IT Sox IT Internal Audit Data analytics IT SOx auditing Desired Candidate Profile Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization PG:Any Postgraduate Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: KPMG KPMG Download PPT Photo 1 View Contact Details

Job.education: UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization PG:Any Postgraduate - Any Specialization Doctorate:Any Doctorate - Any Specialization
Job.jobDescription: Job Description Send me Jobs like this IT help desk/Technical support/Service desk in leading company Are you looking to make your career in Technical support or IT help desk /service desk in leading company? Freshers also can apply! Importance of Technical support/IT help desk The information technology world has created exciting opportunities for anyone seeking a job in the technical world. Of those many jobs, the technical support position offers several advantages. Technical support personnel are typically among the brightest technical professionals , and must be ready to support other technology people, such as programmers, operators and hardware engineers. Technical support skills are totally portable from one company to another. A technical support specialist can take her knowledge with her to a new job and never miss a beat. Job location: Bangalore Salary: 2.5LPA-6 LPA (Depends upon relevant experience and education qualification) Shifts: Day shift/UK/US/ Australian/rotational shifts Cabs provided: 2 way Type : International voice process/Domestic voice process Eligibility: Graduate (Fresher/experienced) Under Graduate(Fresher/experienced) Type: International voice process/Domestic voice process Job summary Technical support and IT help desk executive will apply technical knowledge executive will apply technical knowledge related to computer hardware, software or network problem and providing resolution to end-users by performing a question diagnosis. What does an IT technical support officer do? As an IT help desk, you will be part of the IT crowd so you will be monitoring and maintaining the computer systems as well as the networks within an organization. You will be the first person employees will come to. Career progression and opportunities why career in technical support? Technical support is vital to the ongoing operational efficiency of the company. Supporting the rest of the business with their ongoing IT requirements, the sky is the limit. Being promoted to a more senior technical support role and from there to a team, section or department leader. Technical support can provide useful experience for other jobs Entry requirements One who insist to make career in technical field The computing world evolves very quickly and new technologies are always being developed so it is more important that candidates keep IT knowledge up to date. Typical work activities IT technical support officers are mainly responsible for the smooth running of computer systems and ensuring users get maximum benefits from them. Installing and configuring computer hardware operating systems and applications; Talking staff or clients through a series of actions over the telephone to help set up systems or resolve issues Testing and evaluating new technology; Stay current with system information, changes and updates Diagnose and resolve technical hardware and software issues involving internet connectivity, email clients, IPTV, VOIP and more; Skills and knowledge Knowledge of customer service principles and practices; Effective listening skills; Multi-tasking capabilities; Problem Solving, Verbal Communication, telephone etiquettes, Customer Service, PC Proficiency Competencies Possesses, acquires, and maintains the technical/professional expertise required to do the job effectively and to create effective customer solutions Sets high standards of performance for self; Assuming responsibility and accountability for successfully completing assignments or tasks; Self-imposing standards of excellence rather than having standards imposed. If you're... A logical thinker with excellent problem-solving skills , excellent communication skills and who like to keep up to date with the latest technology then you may be the perfect candidate for working in technical support. You will receive a high standard job training before you start up your job No contract or bond If youre interested to apply for this job call 9611209386 and or send your updated CV to shwetha.ca@ikyaglobal.com Regards CA Shwetha Recruitment consultant-ITES/BPO IKYA Human capital solutions Bangalore Ikya Human Capital Solutions, A Unit of Quess corp, 2nd floor, Raheja Arcade, Beside Punjab grill, Koramangala, Bangalore Landmark: Opposite to Forum mall, Koramangala Contact details Mob: 9611209386 Email : shwetha.ca@ikyaglobal.com Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: BPO / Call Centre / ITES Functional Area: ITES , BPO , KPO , LPO , Customer Service , Operations Role Category:Voice Role:Associate/Senior Associate -(Technical) Keyskills technical support voice support global support help desk technical voice active directory unix System Administrator windows servers LAN WAN IT help desk service desk IBM dell HP Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization PG:Any Postgraduate - Any Specialization Doctorate:Any Doctorate - Any Specialization Company Profile: Ikya Human Capital Solutions Pvt Ltd KYA is the fastest growing HR solutions provider in India, offering world-class services to over 5000+ locations across the country including leading MNCs and large Indian firms across industries and helping nearly 84,000 associates enhance their careers every year. Job.jobDescription: Job Description Send me Jobs like this "Overview Jivox enables the worlds top advertisers and agencies to deliver personalized advertising across all screens. Our flagship product, Jivox IQ, is the leading data-driven dynamic ad platform. Its unique architecture enables customers to develop and serve data-driven dynamic ads in a wide variety of formats, including mobile, interactive, expanding, video, native and much more. Several hundred media companies and agencies today use Jivox for their most demanding creative campaigns, including College Humor, Crispin Porter & Bogusky, Federated Media, Digitas, Havas, Hearst, A&E Networks, Martini Media, Merkley + Partners, Razorfish, TVGla, Universal McCann, Videology and Wieden+Kennedy. Stop by our Ad Gallery at http://www.jivox.com to see our ads at work. Position - Senior AdOps Technical Analyst This position requires an individual with good at Campaign Management - Adops, performance driven, effective communication skills. Also, possesses a good understanding of project/time management skills. Responsibilities This position leads our Global Creative and Design team. The Jivox IQ platform allows our agency and publisher clients to deliver dynamic, rich, multi-screen advertising experiences, and your role will be to ensure that our creative meets the highest quality standards. Core responsibilities include concepting new campaigns in the pre-sales process, executing designs for campaigns in production and ensuring design quality across all aspects of delivery. Youll need a keen eye for fresh and innovative design, as well as strong attention to detail. In this role, youll get to work with some of the most famous US and international brands, as well as top agencies and publishers. Day to day responsibilities include: Managing design quality across all campaigns delivered by the Jivox Client Services team. Work with the sales team to concept advertising for major US brands, to be included in sales/marketing pitches. Design ad units for campaigns executed by the Jivox Client Services team. Work with the Jivox global design and creative team to define, maintain and monitor quality standards. Assist in building a global design team to provide scalable design support across multiple time zones, geographies and advertising markets. Design and execute animations for design concepts as well as live campaigns. Assist in the design of Jivox Corporation branding, marketing and sales materials, including Jivox.com. Salary: Best in the Industry Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: Design , Creative , User Experience Role Category:Senior Management Role:Creative Director Keyskills Marketing Branding Advertising Sales Campaigns Campaign Management Major Effective Communication Skills Presales Agency Desired Candidate Profile Desired Skills and Experience 8 10 years of design experience in the advertising industry working with major US brands. Experience with multiple advertising formats including interactive pre-roll, rich media and mobile advertising types. Experience managing junior design resources, and working with globally distributed teams. Excellent Photoshop skills. Excellent Flash animation skills. Experience with HTML5/Javascript is a plus. Experience with other rich media platforms is a plus. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Excellent attention to detail and project management skills. BA or BS degree in relevant subject. Working hours CST Hours (1 pm to 10 pm)Location - Bangalore" Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization PG:Any Postgraduate Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: Jivox Software Jivox Software Download PPT Photo 1 View Contact Details
